projects.title: online book store
projects.bodyText:
-  Static Online Book Store website developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Responsive layout with book listings and category-based navigation
- JavaScript used for dynamic content display and basic user interactions

projects.title: Blue Wave School – Educational Website
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and developed a responsive school website using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**.
- Implemented multiple pages including Home, About, Academics, and Contact with clean UI design.

projects.title: Vizag Tourism – Informational Web Page
projects.bodyText: - Developed a static informational website about **Visakhapatnam (Vizag)** using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript** Showcased popular tourist places, culture, and attractions with clean layout and structured content.

projects.title: Secure Web-Based Conversational Agent
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a secure educational chatbot using Flask and Groq Large Language Model (LLM) for real-time AI interaction.
- Implemented secure user authentication with bcrypt, session management, and responsive UI using HTML and CSS.
- Integrated SQLite database and REST APIs to handle user data and AI responses securely.

projects.title: Book Nest – Textbook Access Web Application
projects.bodyText:
- Built a Flask-based web application for MCA students to access semester-wise textbooks.
- Implemented secure login with role-based access and designed the frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Used SQLite/MySQL databases for secure storage and management of user and book data.

projects.title: Invoice Generator App
projects.bodyText:
- A web application built using **React** to generate professional invoices.
 - Allows users to add item details, quantities, taxes, and discounts.
 - Supports real-time invoice preview and **PDF download** using jsPDF.
